title: Implement New() constructor and Config struct
description:
Implement TUI initialization:

Config struct:
type Config struct {
    EpicID       string
    EpicTitle    string
    MaxCost      float64
    MaxIteration int
    PauseChan    chan<- bool
}

New(cfg Config) Model function:
1. Initialize all state from config
2. Create viewport.Model with zero dimensions (resized on first WindowSizeMsg)
3. Create help.Model with custom styles
4. Initialize empty tasks slice
5. Set startTime = time.Now()
6. Set running = true
7. Return Model

Init() tea.Cmd:
- Return tickCmd() to start animation ticker
- Could also return tea.EnterAltScreen if not done by program

Exported types for main.go:
- Model
- Config
- TaskInfo, TaskStatus
- All message types (IterationStartMsg, etc.)
- EpicInfo (for picker)
- Picker model
closed_reason: Added Config struct with EpicID/EpicTitle/MaxCost/MaxIteration/PauseChan fields. Implemented New(cfg Config) constructor that initializes all Model state from config, creates viewport with zero dimensions, sets running=true and startTime=time.Now(). Updated Init() to return tickCmd() for animation. Added EpicInfo struct (ID/Title/Priority/Tasks) and full Picker model with Init/Update/View for epic selection. All types exported for main.go. Build and tests pass.
